article.title: BAE Systems Awarded $1.6 Billion Army Contract for Family of Medium Tactical Vehicles
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: BAE Systems has been awarded a $1.6 billion contract from the U.S. Army to build another 10,000 Family of Medium Tactical Vehicles (FMTV). BAE Systems will manufacture the FMTVs in the long-term armor strategy configuration, which is designed to accept an adaptable armor system, allowing protection to be increased or decreased based on the threat.
